thread.title: Everton's Gerard Deulofeu at the centre of three-way transfer tussle with Goodison exit now likely
thread.title_full: Everton's Gerard Deulofeu at the centre of three-way transfer tussle with Goodison exit now likely

author: John Cross
title: Everton's Gerard Deulofeu at the centre of three-way transfer tussle with Goodison exit now likely
text:
Dutch giants Ajax are trying to sign Everton winger Gerard Deulofeu. 
It comes after Everton knocked back Milan's offer to take Deulofeu on loan for the rest of the season. 
Spain under-21 winger Deulofeu, 22, has fallen out of favour with Everton boss Ronald Koeman and will be allowed to leave this window. 
Middlesbrough are also keen on Deulofeu but Ajax have now opened talks and hope to get a deal across the line. 
Milan chief executive Adriano Galliani has not given up and he said: “Everton knows we can do loans or loans with right of redemption.” poll loading Will Everton qualify for Europe this season? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
